Trade/Device Name(s): PARAGON CZE® 2000 Urine Protein Electrophoresis (UPE) Kit
PARAGON CZE® 2000 Urine Immunofixation by Subtraction (U-IFE/s) Kit
Document Summary: FDA 510(k) summary for PARAGON CZE 2000 Urine Protein Electrophoresis Kit and Urine Immunofixation by Subtraction Kit for protein separation and monoclonal component identification in urine using capillary electrophoresis.
Indications for Use Summary: Intended for use with the Paragon CZE 2000 Capillary Electrophoresis System for electrophoretic separation of proteins and immunologic identification of monoclonal components in human urine.
